title: NovaChat
content: NovaChat is a developer-focused platform offering access to generative AI models, intelligent agents, and application hosting across a range of secure environments.
bulletPoints: Delivers generative AI and scalable large language model capabilities through a secure, chat-based interface.
Currently deployed in both unclassified and secure network environments.

title: CoreLab
content: CoreLab is a collaborative AI/ML development workspace designed for engineers and data scientists. It provides centralized access to code, data, and toolchains to accelerate algorithm design and enable rapid deployment of working solutions.
bulletPoints: Built to operate across diverse infrastructure environments.
Enables transparency and collaboration on data-centric projects.
Architected with flexibility to evolve alongside platform growth.

title: SentinelStack
content: SentinelStack is an expeditionary AI platform focused on automating workflows and surfacing actionable insights through user-friendly dashboards. Designed for teams at every level, it supports operations ranging from field maintenance to strategic decision-making.
bulletPoints: Collaborates with field teams to streamline predictive maintenance pipelines.
Builds on best practices from previous enterprise integration efforts.
Modular and interoperable for rapid adoption and scaling.
